title: Development Anti-Pattern: Symptom-Based Debugging
description: Medium process failure: Multiple instances of fixing UI symptoms instead of investigating root database causes. Pattern identified in profile picture upload fixes (July 8-9) when real issue was missing database trigger causing zero profiles. Root cause: Insufficient architectural understanding and debugging methodology. Prevention: Always validate database fundamentals and data integrity before debugging UI issues. Implement systematic debugging checklist.

cross_references.description: Directly resulted from Profile System failure
